name: That Lonesome Valley
description:
Prototype for a gay romance about two sheepherding cowboys in the mountains of Wyoming.

by Robert Yang, made in 1.5 weeks for #GayWesternJam

PLAYERS: 1
AVERAGE RUNTIME: 10-20 minutes
CONTROLS: Mouse
A 2D pixel art gamey-game is very much out of my usual mode, so it was fun to learn a lot of new things. I kinda wanted to make a gay isometric Death Stranding crossed with Wheels of Aurelia.

Unfortunately it's still very incomplete. There's only 2 days of gameplay implemented. I will update / finish it in the next few days... warning: there's no sex scene yet. I know, I know. I'M SORRY, OK.
